net.sf.freecol.client.gui.menu

Class InGameMenuBar

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.MenuElement

    public class InGameMenuBar
extends FreeColMenuBar
    This is the menu bar used in-game.

    The menu bar that is displayed on the top left corner of the Canvas.
    See Also:
    MapEditorMenuBar, Serialized Form
